title: Trend Wear
summary: Shows Google Trends on Android Wear
description: Google Trends shows the top search queries for news articles.Trend Wear displays the top 10 of these search terms on Android Wear smart watches.Each search-term is linked to a news article, which can be opened on the smart phone.Data Source: Google Trends (www.google.com/trends).
descriptionHTML:
Google Trends shows the top search queries for news articles.
Trend Wear displays the top 10 of these search terms on Android Wear smart watches.
Each search-term is linked to a news article, which can be opened on the smart phone.





Data Source: Google Trends (www.google.com/trends).
comments: Works fine on my moto 360 Great app. A bit sluggish but that's a start.
Excellent Great app for getting news on your smartwatch
